desc: 60% all parameters (Light, Dark), 200% Light, Dark elemental damage, fills BB gauge each turn, add to LS (30% Light, Dark elemental damage) & add to BB/SBB (May purge damage reduction from Light, Dark types from all foes (PvP modes only))
lore:
Unlike most others, Joshua never felt it necessary to bestow upon his sword some fanciful, unnecessarily obscure name. As a practical man who lived—and perhaps would someday die—by the sword, he preferred actions to words.
For those who had already dubbed him ""Joshua of Sanjelo"", it was a crime not to name his blade something impressive. After hours of arguing over which of the increasingly verbose names the weapon deserved, Joshua interjected in his usual abrasive manner with his final verdict.
A Silver Knight armed with the Silver Blade is as apt as it gets, he supposed.
name: The Silver Blade
